articles.title: Expiration of protected status threatens Boston’s Haitian families
articles.description:
More than 350,000 Haitians nationwide, including thousands in Boston, could lose legal status when Temporary Protected Status ends Feb. 3.

The post Expiration of protected status threatens Boston’s Haitian families appeared first on Boston.com.
